transcript:
Customer: Ha ji, who call?
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Ha ji kaun?
Customer: Avik Mondol baat kar raha hun Power Ledger Technology se.
Executive: Accha accha. Ha sir bataiye.
Customer: Mera IndiaMART mein thoda dikkat ho raha hai, ek bhi lead nahi mil raha hai. Main jara mera location pe.
Executive: Accha. Check kariye na kya dikkat ho raha hai. Do mahine se nahi mil raha hai.
Customer: Thik hai sir. Sahi hai.
Executive: Thik hai. Sir main na abhi lunch ke liye.
Customer: Thik hai. Lunch ke baad call kariye na.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving any buyleads on IndiaMART.



Resolution:

- Executive asked to call back after lunch.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back after lunch.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, location, technical issue
